DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Book Kit - Facing the Sea (8 colors)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo Book Kit - "Facing the Sea" includes the Face Painting Book "Facing the Sea" and eight Snazaroo 2 ml face paints (White, Black, Bright Red, Sky Blue, Bright Yellow, Orange, Dark Grey, Bright Pink). The face painting book has easy-to-follow steps for interesting sea designs featuring guest artist Lisa Smiley from California. This pack is a great resource for beginner or intermediate face painters to learn more about face paint designs.
Snazaroo Face Paints are hypoallergenic and the world's safest face paints, meeting US FDA, Canadian, and European standards for cosmetic safety and the only face paint with a Child Toy Safety Rating. Snazaroo paint is non-toxic and easy to use face paint that is water-based, fragrance-free and wash off easily.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 8 color Snazaroo Cat Face Painting Kit will paint well over 50 faces
Non toxic, hypo allergenic and child friendly paint from Snazaroo
White, Black, Bright Red, Sky Blue, Bright Yellow, Orange, Dark Grey, Bright Pink
